metadata.Title: CVE-2021-4010 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in xorg-x11-server in versions before 21.1.2 and before 1.20.14. An out-of-bounds access can occur in the SProcScreenSaverSuspend function. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity as well as system availability.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> xorg server is actually the xorg-server package the xorg package only contains docs xwayland package contains parts of xorg-server This is ZDI-CAN-14951 looks like this was introduced by: https://gitlab.freedesktop.org/xorg/xserver/-/commit/52048ce29f872192478fece3887b7bc1c8aace7d

criterions.comment: xorg-server-hwe-16.04: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
